The user manipulates pre-existing ice and forms it into a giant tiger. It is cold enough to freeze any [[Water Release]] technique that it comes into contact with.

[[es:Elemento Hielo: Tigre Feroz]]
[[pl:Hyōton: Haryū Mōko]]
